text:
My child has been at Mulberry Braddell for four months, and it has been a fantastic journey! We transferred from another school, and he adapted incredibly quickly—he absolutely looks forward to school every day!

The teachers at check-in are professional and proactive, always stepping out happily to welcome the children. This reflects how well-staffed and caring the team is. My child also bonded with his teachers and friends very quickly and has never once said he doesn’t want to go to school.

We’re truly grateful for the care and support from MBR. A special thank you to Principal Ms. Fornia, who is highly professional and goes above and beyond to support parents in their journey. Thank you, Ms. Fornia, and the entire team at MBR!

Enrolled my girls in this school less than a year ago, and I’m very pleased with what it offers. The teachers have been with the school long-term, which speaks volumes about the environment. My kids love their teachers, and the principal is proactive and involved. The school also organizes many activities that engage both parents and children, fostering a strong community. Plus, it helps that this is an HQ-managed school rather than a franchise. No regrets putting my girls here—highly recommended!

I love mulberry braddell! My daughter enjoys her school days so much. I remember Their indoor playground has won my daughter’s heart on the first day of site checking.

Teachers and principal were very friendly and caring towards all the kids. I can feel their sincerity. Definitely a safe space for our children.

I can also see the school’s effort in creating interesting curriculum and activities so our children can learn through play and never get bored.

Our child was well-taken care of since he attended Mulberry's Infant Care at 4 months old. Teachers kept us updated via the Mulberry app with photos and messages, letting us know activities our child has been engaged in, such as baby spa.

The transition to PN was calibrated, spending a few hours at PN each day, before moving over fully.

PN was filled with activities such as arts and crafts, Habits of Mind training  and Chinese lessons. The curriculum is quite holistic and beneficial for the children under their care.

The experience has been excellent, and our child's keen interest in going to school is a testament to Mulberry's teachers and curriculum.

I enrolled my girl for infantcare last year. The teachers provide regular updates via the app, and share plenty of photos and videos for memories. On the whole, I am quite satisfied that my girl is well taken care of and that she enjoys her interactions with the teachers and others.
